references.description: The SNOMED code represents Drug or medicament

description: This schema represents a therapeutic agent, single-active ingredient or combination.

_88ingredient_strength_unit_value.description: A therapeutic agent can be the combination of more than one active ingredients, hence this isn an array.

references.description: Units are drawn in part from FDA units of measure

___unit.description: The list of most commonly used units of measure for a medication's strength. Suggestions for additions are accepted.

references.description: The NCIT code represents Pharmaceutical Strength

items.description: This property represents the strength of a therapeutic agent. The value set covers the most common values. Suggestions for additions are accepted.

___rxnorm_code.description: The RxNORM CUI of the drug, which includes drug name, strength (if applicable), formulation, manufacturer.

___trade_name.description: The trade (brand) name of the drug.

$eref.description: A therapeutic agent can be the combination of more than one active ingredients, hence this isn an array.

references.description: Units are drawn in part from FDA units of measure

___unit.description: The list of most commonly used units of measure for a medication's strength. Suggestions for additions are accepted.

references.description: The NCIT code represents Pharmaceutical Strength

items.description: This property represents the strength of a therapeutic agent. The value set covers the most common values. Suggestions for additions are accepted.

___generic_name.description: The generic name of the drug.
